title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text:
October 2022: First set of controls to prevent certain foreign military and intelligence services from obtaining advanced GPUs
October 2023: BIS expanded export controls specifically aiming at limiting the PRC’s AI capabilities



The GPU ban temporarily reduced the development of the PRC’s AI models performance.

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
section: Uniqueness of the AI Performance Data

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text:
Feasibility of Synthetic Control Method

Donor units must be sufficiently similar to the treated unit
The treated unit can be approximated by the control units
Unit weights must be nonnegative and add up to one to avoid extrapolation
Larger donor pool than pre-treatment period can lead to overfitting
Pre-treatment outcomes unaffected by future intervention
No spillover effects
… …

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text:
Requirements for a Solution

The treated unit and controlled units should be comparable
Such transformation needs to robust
Not just spamming units and characteristics, for larger number of characteristics than pre-treatment time steps may cause over fitting

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text: Multi-head Attention Mechanism

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text: Multi-head Attention Mechanism

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text:
Multi-head Attention Mechanism in SCM

Linear Layers to create Query, Key and Value Matrices, and dividing into heads \(h\) and size of heads \(s\), where \(h*s=k\):

\[ \mathbf{Q}_{i h s} = (\mathbf{X}_{i k} \mathbf{W}_Q)_{i h s}, \mathbf{K}_{i h s} = (\mathbf{X}_{i k} \mathbf{W}_K)_{i h s}, \mathbf{V}_{i h s} = (\mathbf{X}_{i k} \mathbf{W}_V)_{i h s} \]

Creating contextualized characteristics:

\[ \mathbf{C}_{i k} = \mathrm{concat}\!\Bigl(\mathrm{softmax}\!\bigl(\frac{\mathbf{Q}\mathbf{K'}}{\sqrt{s}}\bigr)\,\mathbf{V}\Bigr) \]

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text:
Multi-head Attention Mechanism in SCM

Optimization of the discrepancy of contextualized characteristics, where \(\mathbf{W}\) is the weights on units:

\[ Loss = \sqrt{\left(\mathbf{C}_{i=1} - \mathbf{C}_{i>1}\mathbf{W}\right)' \mathbf{V} \left(\mathbf{C}_{i=1} - \mathbf{C}_{i>1}\mathbf{W}\right)} \]

Choosing a \(V\) matrix that represent the relation among the characteristics:

\[ \mathbf{MSE} = \mathrm{mean}\Bigl(\mathbf{Y}_{i=1} - \mathbf{W}\,\mathrm{MultiheadAttention}(\mathbf{Y}_{i>1})\Bigr)^2 \]

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text:
Multi-head Attention in SCM

Linear Layers to create Query, Key and Value Matrices, and dividing into heads \(h\) and size of heads \(s\), where \(h*s=k\):

\[ \mathbf{Q}_{i h s} = (\mathbf{X}_{i k} \mathbf{W}_Q)_{i h s}, \mathbf{K}_{i h s} = (\mathbf{X}_{i k} \mathbf{W}_K)_{i h s}, \mathbf{V}_{i h s} = (\mathbf{X}_{i k} \mathbf{W}_V)_{i h s} \]

Creating contextualized characteristics:

\[ \mathbf{C}_{i k} = \mathrm{concat}\!\Bigl(\mathrm{softmax}\!\bigl(\frac{\mathbf{Q}\mathbf{K'}}{\sqrt{s}}\bigr)\,\mathbf{V}\Bigr) \]

title: A Contextualized Synthetic Control Method:
text:
Multi-head Attention in SCM

Optimization of the discrepancy of contextualized characteristics, where \(\mathbf{W}\) is the weights on units:

\[ Loss = \sqrt{\left(\mathbf{C}_{i=1} - \mathbf{C}_{i>1}\mathbf{W}\right)' \mathbf{V} \left(\mathbf{C}_{i=1} - \mathbf{C}_{i>1}\mathbf{W}\right)} \]

Choosing a \(V\) matrix that represent the relation among the characteristics:

\[ MSE = \mathrm{mean}\Bigl(\mathbf{Y}_{i=1} - \mathbf{W}\,\mathrm{MultiheadAttention}(\mathbf{Y}_{i>1})\Bigr)^2 \]
